Summary: Please call me [cms/tg/pd] I need to tell this story before I die.
divs: sighting detailsi went to bed,woke up standing part way up a steep incline waiting for someone,there was a hugh ufo on the ground close to the edge of the path about 200 feet up,they were checking the edge to make sure the land would hold the weight.i was looking down at a small city- i was not sure where i was,i thought mexico maybe. there was some kind of disaster getting readyto happen.the man i was waiting for walked up to me and we went down to the city below to get people they wanted first.we went to a store,up the stairs to the second floor where the man,wife,2 children\they followed us,we gathered many people they wanted.this is a long story-in the mourning when they put me back i woke my friend janet up and told her about it,i turned the t v on and it was on the news i was in columbia sa .the nevado del ruiz volcano had killed 23,000 people.this ufo picked up thousands of people there was a second ufo upstream from where the one i was on.they changed the outside shape so people could hold on,it came in three big waves of ice,trees dead animals and people,i am trying not two cry,but i do anyway.the lower deck had a hugh round columb going up with white railing,the light hurt my eyes the top deck had soft pink light,very nice.there were people just like me or you,different races,they were dressed in blue jumpsuits.i got in an argument with one of them because i refused to do something.when they put me back they put a ramp down the tall grey one asked me if i knew what my gift was- i felt stupid and said if your so smart why dont you tell me. i am not good at computer stuff.i am 67 years old in a few weeks.call if you want. i went to a shrink\he found no patholgy,said i get a little paranoid at times.
